title: DCS Microfibre Cleaning Cloth, Blue, Pack of 20, Large Size: 40x40cm. Super Soft Premium Streak Free Washable Cloth Duster for Kitchen, Bathrooms, Surfaces, Mirrors, Car, Motorbike
features: ULTRA SOFT CLEANING CLOTH THAT IS SCRATCH FREE - Ultra soft and highly absorbent microfibre cleaning cloths, great for cleaning windows, kitchenware, car or other delicate surfaces.

VERY ABSORBENT ULTRA FINE AND ALMOST LINT FREE - Made of 80% Polyester, 20% Polyamide. Our non-abrasive cleaning rags can absorb seven times their weight in water, making them perfect for quickly soaking up water from the countertop and tables without leaving lint or streaks behind. Clean or polish with or without water. Our clothes will leave your home sparkling on worktops, appliances, kitchens, bathrooms, mirrors or vehicles.

TACKLE ANY CLEANING JOBS - Our premium microfiber towels are large at 40x40 cm, making them perfect for removing grease and particles from dishes, oven tops, pots or pans and great for polishing surfaces to remove fingermarks from sink taps to your silverware or glassware. Making your home look shiny and spotless

REUSABLE & LONG LASTING TRUSTED BY THE PROFESSIONALS - Our microfiber cleaning cloths are large 40x40cm allowing you to fold them and still fit your hand. They feature high-quality stitching with reinforced edges making them designed to last so they can be washed repeatedly and not lose quality. They are lightweight, and because they contain 20% Polyamide, they are super absorbent. They can absorb seven times their weight in water.
CAN BE USED AT THE OFFICE, HOME, WORKPLACE AND EVEN INDUSTRIAL AND PROFESSIONAL USE - As these tiny microfibres work hard for you collecting dirt from any surface.
